introduction.para: This document details a pre-ride check list to ensure bicycle safety and proper functionality. Following these steps before each ride will minimize the risk of mechanical failure and enhance rider safety.

tools_equipment.item: (Optional) Torque wrench (for fasteners - refer to component specifications)

step.action: Check the overall condition of the bike before every ride.
step.indication_abnormal: Any visible damage or unusual wear.

step.action: Check all fasteners (bolts, nuts, quick releases) for tightness.
step.indication_normal: All fasteners are secure and tight.
step.warning: Incorrect tightening force can result in component failure, leading to loss of control.
step.remedy: Tighten and torque fastener according to specific maintenance instruction for the related component.

step.action: Lift the front wheel off the ground 2-3 inches and bounce it on the ground.
step.indication_abnormal: Bike rattles or parts appear loose.
step.remedy: Secure the loose part according to the specific maintenance instruction for the related part.

step.indication_normal: Tire pressure is correct according to the specification printed on the tire sidewall.
step.indication_abnormal: Tire pressure is outside the specified range.

sub_step.action: Bleed air from the tire until it reaches the maximum pressure printed on the sidewall.
Add air to the tire, not exceeding the maximum pressure printed on the sidewall.

step.action: Inspect the tire for cuts or cracks.
step.indication_normal: Tire has no cuts or cracks.
step.warning: Riding on a damaged tire could cause tire failure, leading to loss of control.

step.action: Spin each wheel and observe for wobble.
step.caution: Wheels must be true for rim brakes to work effectively.
step.remedy: Have the bike serviced to true the wheels.

step.indication_normal: No wear indicator marks are visible on the rim.
step.indication_abnormal: Wear indicator marks are visible on the rim.
step.warning: Riding on a rim at the end of its life can result in wheel failure and loss of control.

step.indication_normal: Front and rear brakes securely grip the wheel rim. Brake lever movement is within 1 inch.

sub_step.remedy: Tighten brakes according to maintenance procedure. Check/replace brake cables if necessary.
Tighten brakes according to maintenance procedure.
